info.name: Thingsboard
info.description: ThingsBoard is an open-source IoT platform for data collection, processing, visualization, and device management.

request.description: The `auth/login` route is an API for logging in to ThingsBoard. It allows users to authenticate by sending credentials to the server. If the credentials are valid, an authentication token is issued for accessing protected resources within the system.

This HTTP request fetches information about a specific device identified by the UUID from the ThingsBoard platform. It likely returns details such as device status, telemetry data, and configuration settings.

response.name: device data

request.description: This allows for the creation of a device with specific characteristics, using the credentials provided during device creation to authenticate with the platform.
Enables transferring a device to another client by specifying the client ID.
It is used to retrieve the credentials associated with the device identified by the UUID.
